title: Sukuwanakya Dame desu ka? Isekai - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Mystery   Romance   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Cheats   Game Elements   Gods   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Special Abilities   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   Virtual Reality
author: Aoyama Yuu   Yu Aoyama   青山　有
description:
Save the other world? My opponent is... those from my world?

'Everyone, from here on, you will be sent to another world.' With those words from a goddess, Michinaga alighted in another world. He possesses three thieving-type skills. Relying on those skills and while meeting people who have the odd quirk or two, he starts working towards saving the world.

What is the true meaning behind the goddess' words? Three hints: 'save the world', 'capture dungeons' and 'your opponents are those from your world'. >
